jd: From: Rohan Thakur, Diasoftwaresolutions rohan@diasoftwaresolutions.com Reply to: rohan@diasoftwaresolutions.com Job Title: Senior Business AnalystLocation: Lansing, MI (Hybrid)Experience: 10+ yearsDuration: 1 year with possible extensionPlease share Resumes At Rohan@diasoftwaresolutions.comKey Responsibilities:Facilitate meetings between the technical team and business clients, acting as the primary liaison.Gather requirements and project specifications by independently leading requirement sessions.Maintain a backlog of work items in Azure DevOps, managing project tasks, timelines, and communication between business product owners and the development team.Track sprints and ticket progress in Azure DevOps while ensuring adherence to departmental change management policies.Maintain documentation on the project SharePoint site.Provide management with project status reports and resource demand projections.Qualifications:Required Skills:8+ years of exposure to complex IT web applications.8+ years of experience in a professional office environment.3+ years as a Business Analyst supporting software development projects.3+ years of experience leading meetings and conducting training/information sessions.Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).2+ years of experience liaising between development teams and project managers/business clients in software development projects.6 months of experience with Azure DevOps.Highly Desired Skills:2+ years of knowledge and understanding of the Software Development Lifecycle.6 months of project management experience and knowledge of related methodologies.6 months of experience with Microsoft SharePoint.6 months of experience with the Salesforce platform.6 months of experience with MS Dynamics 365.
